details.arabic_diacless: رب فلا تجعلنى فى القوم الظٰلمين‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِىۡ فِى الۡقَوۡمِ الظّٰلِمِيۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen
details.translations: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.

pageTitle: Dua for not placing among wrongdoers [23:94]
